akn:content.akn:p:
§ 426a. Qualifications of members of commission In appointing the members of the commission created by section 426 of this title the Secretary of the Interior shall, as far as practicable, select persons familiar with the terrain of the battlefield of Stones River, Tennessee, and the historical events associated therewith. (Mar. 3, 1927, ch. 374, § 2, 44 Stat. 1399; Ex. Ord. No. 6166, § 2, June 10, 1933; Ex. Ord. No. 6228, § 1, July 28, 1933.)
Executive Documents
Transfer of Functions Transfer of administrative functions of park, see note set out under section 426 of this title.
